title: Sign In

pageView.item1:
**Simple and fast**

Convert your svg icons to a lighter format and improve the performance of your apps.
pageView.item2:
**Cloud storage**

Your icons are automatically stored in our cloud and you can access them whenever you want.
pageView.item3:
**Real-time synchronization**

Work as a team and increase your productivity, you can visualize in real-time the changes and new icons added by other users.
pageView.item4:
**Easy integration**

Add your icons to your application in a very simple way using our CLI or downloading the configuration files.

forgotPasswordDialog.title: Forgot Your Password?
forgotPasswordDialog.label: Enter your email address to reset your password
forgotPasswordDialog.success: We have sent an email to reset your password
forgotPasswordDialog.emailNotFound: No account was found with the email {{email}}
